name: Rocket Ticker
description:
8 Levels with one minute to reach the Planet. Click on the Angle  Arrow to choose your direction. Hold down the Gas to adjust your Rocket Booster duration.  Press R to reset level, and Escape to close app.

- Collect Clocks to increase your time
- Collect Gas  to refill your gas tank
- Score is saved for each level

Huge Thanks to GamesPlusJames for hosting GamesPlusJam game jam event!
(this game was made for this event)
